Detailed Description

A class that implements a quaternion.

Member Function Documentation

void XsQuaternion::assign ( const XsReal *  values)
inline

Set the Quaternion to the specific values in the supplied array.

Parameters
valuesAn array that contains at least 4 items. The first four will be interpreted as w,x,y,z
